title: Dr. Syama Prasad Mookherjee Swimming Pool Complex || Sports Authority of India
content: Dr. Syama Prasad Mookherjee Swimming Pool Complex || Sports Authority of India Cancel Preloader 0 12.13 एकड़ (49088.36 वर्ग मीटर)भूमि क्षेत्र, 5000 निश्चित सीटों के साथ पूरी तरह से एसी इंडोर स्टेडियम Dr. Syama Prasad Mookherjee Swimming Pool Complex About Facilities Contact Us The Dr S P Mookerjee Swimming Stadium or SPM Swimming Pool Complex is a swimming complex in New Delhi, India, that hosted the aquatics events for the 2010 Commonwealth Games. The stadium is owned by the Sports Authority of India (SAI). It was renovated at a cost of Rs 377 crore (U$84.89 million). 50 Mtr. Swimming pool (10 lane). 25 Mtr. Diving pool. 50 Mtr. Warm-up pool (six lane). Available sports facilities – In addition to Swimming there is facility for Volleyball, Skating, Billiard & Snooker and Multi-Gym. Name: Sh. Sanjay Bisht Designation: Administrator Phone: 011-23094832, 011-23092767 Email: spmspc-sai[at]gov[dot]in Address: Mother Teresa Cres, Talkatora Garden, President Estate, Delhi -110001 Landmark: Opposite to president house gate No. 31 Sports Authority of India Gallery Book This Stadium Read More
